step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you move them towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the stretch is important. Ensure you maintain an upright posture and avoid pulling your head forward.
Returning to the start is good. In the next reps, try to keep your wrists and elbows from drifting too far apart as you reverse the motion.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and elbows closer to your head as you move. This helps you get the most out of the stretch.
